## pitch variable

This simple loader wraps the loading of CSS in script equivalent to require("load-themed-styles").loadStyles('... css text ...').

**Signature:**

```typescript
pitch: PitchLoaderDefinitionFunction<ILoadThemedStylesLoaderOptions>
```
